text: jo log dharatee mein naahaq bade banate hai, main apanee nishaaniyon kee or se unhen pher doonga. yadi ve pratyek nishaanee dekh le tab bhee ve us par eemaan nahin laenge. yadi ve seedha maarg dekh len to bhee ve use apana maarg nahin banaenge. lekin yadi ve pathabhrasht ka maarg dekh len to use apana maarg thahara lenge. yah isalie kee unhonne hamaaree aayaton ko jhuthalaaya aur unase gaafil rahe
